[[Gozu]] can change parts of his body in a manner that is reminiscent of the [[Akimichi clan]]'s [[Partial Multi-Size Technique]] to increase the strength and range of his attacks. Using this ability on his legs also gives him much greater linear speed. Similarly, he can condense his muscle mass to give him even greater speed and agility.

[[es:Alteración de Cuerpo]]
[[pt-br:Técnica de Expansão Muscular]]
[[pl:Modyfikacja Ciała]]
